thread.title: Victoria
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text: I have been following Kayla on Instagram for a while and finally decided to purchase the BBG guide through the discount website. I'm so happy I did! I was able to get it at an 80% discount which is an amazing value for this guide. The entire process was so easy. I paid online and received an email with the downloads almost immediately. I love how easy the guide is to follow because they break down every exercise and workout. I can't wait to get started!
